channel.title: KVO on Flying blind - coding nonsense
channel.description: Recent content in KVO on Flying blind - coding nonsense

item.title: KVO, KVC and Bindings
item.description: The original tutorial was published in Cocoa Programming for OS X: The Big Nerd Ranch Guide in April, 2015. As far as I know this was last macOS/AppKit/Cocoa book by Aaron Hillegass, later he published only about iOS/UIKit. Although the book was written for Xcode 6.3 and Swift 1.2 it is a very interesting and useful reading in case you are interested in macOS programming. We will create a simple Thermostat app with minimal code using KVC.
